package.name: acdkx_rdmi
package.title: ACDK Remote DMI (acdkx_rdmi)
package.shortdescription: acdkx_rmdi implements a transparent remote invocation for ACDK.
package.copyright: Copyright © 2000 - 2005 by Roger Rene Kommer, artefaktur
package.description:
acdkx_rdmi provides a transparent remoting for all ACDK objects.
Currently it is in alpha status. For completion acdkx_rdmi an asynchronous IO framework has to be established. Some %ref[conceptual notes, acdkx_rdmi_concept] are available.
